description: Associate your own domain name with the App Runner subdomain URL of your App Runner service. After you call AssociateCustomDomain and receive a successful response, use the information in the  CustomDomain record that's returned to add CNAME records to your Domain Name System (DNS). For each mapped domain name, add a mapping to the target App Runner subdomain and one or more certificate validation records. App Runner then performs DNS validation to verify that you own or control the domain name that you associated. App Runner tracks domain validity in a certificate stored in AWS Certificate Manager (ACM).

parameters.name: ServiceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the App Runner service that you want to associate a custom domain name with.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: A custom domain endpoint to associate. Specify a root domain (for example, example.com), a subdomain (for example, login.example.com or admin.login.example.com), or a wildcard (for example, *.example.com).

parameters.name: EnableWWWSubdomain
parameters.description: Set to true to associate the subdomain www.DomainName with the App Runner service in addition to the base domain. Default: true.

nested_items.name: DNSTarget
nested_items.description: The App Runner subdomain of the App Runner service. The custom domain name is mapped to this target name.

nested_items.name: ServiceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the App Runner service with which a custom domain name is associated.

nested_items.name: CustomDomain
nested_items.description: A description of the domain name that's being associated.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: An associated custom domain endpoint. It can be a root domain (for example, example.com), a subdomain (for example, login.example.com or admin.login.example.com), or a wildcard (for example, *.example.com).

nested_items.name: EnableWWWSubdomain
nested_items.description: When true, the subdomain www.DomainName is associated with the App Runner service in addition to the base domain.

nested_items.name: CertificateValidationRecords
nested_items.description: A list of certificate CNAME records that's used for this domain name.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current state of the certificate CNAME record validation. It should change to SUCCESS after App Runner completes validation with your DNS.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current state of the domain name association.

nested_items.name: VpcDNSTargets
nested_items.description: DNS Target records for the custom domains of this Amazon VPC.

nested_items.name: VpcIngressConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPC Ingress Connection that is associated with your service.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon VPC that is associated with the custom domain name of the target DNS.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The domain name of your target DNS that is associated with the Amazon VPC.
